warrior.name: Warrior
warrior.shortDescription: Stick them with the pointy end
warrior.longDescription: Your companion understands the importance of balance. A strong attack is pointless if you aren't alive to fight back.

tank.name: Tank
tank.longDescription: Is that armor on your pet? No, that's not possible. Just a trick of the light surely. Come to think of it, you can't remember the last time they were injured. Could this be related?

assassin.name: Assassin
assassin.longDescription: Fresh new kicks and pants, your pet makes every battle look like a dance. If your enemies can't go with the flow in a spin, if they can't move to this, then they are dead.
